mapper.insert: insert into member (mid, password, name, gender, birth, address, phone, category) values (#{mid},#{password},#{name},#{gender},#{birth},#{address},#{phone},#{category})
mapper.select: select * from member where mid = #{mid} and password = #{password}
select m.mid, m.name, m.POWER from member m join status s on m.mid = s.mid where cno = #{cno}
